profiles.noUiConfigs: No UI configurations found. Check Store settings.
profiles.shadowedExplanation: Shadowed files occur when multiple packs expose files to the same path. The "winner" pack's file is used, while the "shadowed" pack's file is hidden.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.subtitle: Manage your model storage and backups

stats.cleanupTooltip: Delete model files that are no longer referenced by any pack. Frees up disk space.
stats.verifyTooltip: Check all files match their SHA256 checksums. Detects corrupted files.
stats.doctorTooltip: Scan and repair issues: fix broken references, rebuild indexes, optimize database.
stats.backupTooltip: Copy all local-only model files to backup storage. Protects against data loss.
stats.backupNotConnected: Backup storage not connected. Connect your backup drive first.
stats.allBackedUp: All model files are already backed up.
stats.pushMessage: This will copy {{count}} local file(s) to backup storage. Backup files will be overwritten.
stats.pullMessage: This will restore {{count}} file(s) from backup. Local files will be overwritten.
stats.mergeMessage: This will sync all files bidirectionally. Newer files will overwrite older ones on both sides.

cleanup.noOrphansDescription: Your storage is clean! All blobs are referenced by packs.

impacts.title: Impact Analysis

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.cacheResultsDesc: Store extraction results to speed up repeated requests
advanced.alwaysFallbackDesc: Use regex extraction when AI providers fail
advanced.showProviderDesc: Display which AI provider extracted the parameters
advanced.logRequestsDesc: Record requests to AI providers for debugging
advanced.logRawResponsesDesc: Include complete AI responses in logs

provider.ruleBasedDesc: Pattern matching extraction. No AI providers required.
provider.noMatchingModels: No matching models. Type to use a custom model name.

tasks.extractionDesc: Extract generation parameters from model descriptions
